attributes.action: New Taxation / Growth Strategy to get the UK economy moving forward
attributes.additional_details:
Growth for the past 12 months has been painfully slow, and has affected nearly every household in Britain.

The current economic strategy is simply not creating growth at the level required to pull Britain out of economic stagnation.

We need to review every aspect of the taxation system to encourage business investment, increase business and consumer confidence and consumers to spend, tourists to come over.
